title: Logging Standardization Progress Update
details:
# Logging Standardization Progress Update

## Accomplishments
1. Fixed the formatting issue in VideoNoteProcessor.cs that was preventing builds
2. Updated YamlHelper to use properly injected ILogger<YamlHelper>
3. Modified IYamlHelper interface to include the RemoveFrontmatter method
4. Updated VideoNoteProcessor to use ILoggingService 
5. Fixed constructor parameter ordering in VideoNoteProcessor to put required parameters first
6. Updated ServiceRegistration to match the new constructor signatures
7. Core project now builds successfully!

## Remaining Issues
1. Tests and CLI still need updating:
   - Multiple test files have errors due to the changed constructor parameters
   - TagProcessor and MetadataTemplateManager constructor calls in tests need updates

## Next Steps
1. Address the test failures by updating constructor calls in test files
2. Update TagCommands.cs in the CLI project to use the updated constructor signatures
3. Run a full build with tests to ensure everything works

## Implementation Details
1. VideoNoteProcessor constructor signature changed to:
   ```csharp
   public VideoNoteProcessor(
       ILogger<VideoNoteProcessor> logger, 
       AISummarizer aiSummarizer, 
       IYamlHelper yamlHelper, 
       IOneDriveService? oneDriveService = null, 
       AppConfig? appConfig = null, 
       ILoggingService? loggingService = null)
   ```

2. MetadataTemplateManager constructor signature changed to:
   ```csharp
   public MetadataTemplateManager(
       ILogger logger, 
       AppConfig appConfig,
       IYamlHelper yamlHelper)
   ```

3. IYamlHelper interface updated with:
   ```csharp
   string RemoveFrontmatter(string markdown);
   ```

This refactoring is a significant step toward centralizing all logging through LoggingService.
